about: I am a software engineer with a passion for building scalable web applications. I have experience working with JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Ruby on Rails. I am currently seeking new opportunities to grow my skills and work on exciting projects.

experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js. Worked closely with product managers and designers to deliver high-quality features.
Assisted in the development of a Ruby on Rails application. Implemented new features and fixed bugs under the guidance of senior engineers.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
